extendedInfo.description: Would you like to see Paper Monsters on PC? Vote for Paper Monsters on Steam Greenlight!http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=92226289STUFF MagazineIf youâre looking for a gorgeous-looking platformer with that pick up and playability, youâll find everything you need and more with Paper Monsters.G4TV.com"The controls are masterfully crafted""a fresh, original soundtrack add those special touches to an already solid game"GAMEZEBO"For lack of a better word, it's perfect. Everyone should play this"USA TODAY"From the gameplay to presentation to control, Paper Monsters is a real treat..."APPADVICE.com"Paper Monsters Redefines The Boundaries Of Side Scrolling Adventures"Dive into the world of Paper Monsters and watch a living world made out of paper, cardboard, and a few cotton balls unfold right before your eyes. Paper Monsters takes all of the classic 2d platforming elements, combines them with cutting edge graphics and then packs it onto your Android device.--FEATURES-- â¢Classic 2d sidescrolling gameplay with gorgeous 3d environments. â¢Xperia support for the ultimate mobile experience â¢Original and adorable characters â¢Awesome original soundtrack - headphones recommended! â¢Fun under water and flying powerups. â¢Two touch scontrol types: "floating" Joystick or classic touch pad â¢28 Large Levels across 6 unique worlds â¢Tons of secret areas! â¢High score dash mode for endless replay value! â¢Fun for all ages

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This game feels like the first well done platformer on a phone. Good graphics, cutesyness that isn\'t overwhelming, good flow, just over all awesome.
reviews.author: Alex Sade

reviews.title: Great game for kids
reviews.comment: Nice visual style, easy to play,  and the kids love it.. no problems on sasmsung galaxy note 2 or nexus 7
reviews.author: Mark Bermudez

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Easy to get started but a relatively deep and fun platformer. Recommended.
reviews.author: Ed Dombrowski

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love this game!! Worth the money with smooth and great graphics especially on my galaxy note 2
reviews.author: Adrian Montoya

reviews.title: Excellent with lots of variety
reviews.comment: This is one of the best platform games. Graphics are nice and feel paperous. Gameplay offers gr8 vareity. Level design varies interms of design and gfx. There is also an optional  jump and run stlye mode .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Instant classic. HOWEVER
reviews.comment: The type of game that must send the fear of god into Nintendo.  I mean who the hell will want a dedicated handheld games console when the quality is this good on your phone or tablet? Stunningly presented with intuitive controls. Its enough to give Mario a complex. And believe me I have owned every device Nintendo have ever released.  BUGS LAGS LIKE CRAZY IN PLACES AND WILL SHUT DOWN HALFWAY THROUGH A LEVEL. HAVE CONTACTED DEVS TO NO REPLY. ASUS ICONIA TABLET JELLYBEAN.
reviews.author: Paul Price

reviews.title: Best 99 cents I have spent on a game!
reviews.comment: Awesome graphics and controls are great. If you like platform games like Mario Bros. You will love this game
reviews.author: Matthew Ybarra

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Delicious graphics, simple game play. Fantastic game. Looking forward to more from this developer.
reviews.author: Jose Fontana

reviews.title: Disclosure
reviews.comment: Game does not work on the samsung galaxy S. Apparently the devs are aware, but fail to mention it. The 99\302\242 is worth more to them than credibility.
reviews.author: Quyd Avery

reviews.title: Great visuals game play could use work
reviews.comment: often times the joystick touch pad doesn\'t read when I try to move forward which is especially annoying when it comes to jumps. I can\'t make it past that one jump in the third level because for some reason I can\'t double jump.
reviews.author: maggie c

reviews.title: Refund Please
reviews.comment: Not My Game; Got Bored In A Few Mins; Refund Please? Ps You Should Make A Free Trial For People To Try Out; With Limited Levels In The Trial.
reviews.author: Antonia Ayers

reviews.title: Droid Razr Maxx
reviews.comment: Downloaded last night.  Have not Even opened ap. My phone froze just now and I had to restart. When it restarted game was gone from home page. Perhaps malware of some sort. 99 cent down the drain. Should have searched for a free version first.
reviews.author: Charles Edward

reviews.title: Fun, but short
reviews.comment: Beautiful game, silly and entertaining. The main adventure is short, but the last couple of levels are at least a little challenging. I personally don\'t like virtual joysticks m so I\'m glad you can swap it out. Easily worth a buck.
reviews.author: Douglas Scheider

reviews.title: great game.
reviews.comment: It has excellent graphics and very fun to play. It just need to support controllers plugged via OTG, and also you can use a keyboard to move around but you can\'t jump with it maybe because jump is not bind to up arrow key.
reviews.author: Ephraim Reiner Leveriza

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Incredible game,  very creative.  Challenging,  there is always something new and  adventurous. Excellent :)
reviews.author: Vitaly O\'Connor

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: Really fun platformer game, definitely worth a buck. only problem is that sometimes upon opening, all I get is a blinking bomb guy, and it doesn\'t load
reviews.author: Austin Quinney

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This is a brilliant game with excellent controls. The art style is fantastic and the varied game types are brilliant. This could easily be a full priced retail game for 3DS/PS Vita.
reviews.author: Paul Keelan

reviews.title: Beautiful and fun, but. . .
reviews.comment: The game is great, but has bombed my phone twice now on quit. Causes the screen to go black and not recover. Only option is to hard reset.   Nexus 4 android 4.2.2 jellybean
reviews.author: Aubrey Wooldridge

reviews.title: Well made but boring
reviews.comment: Wasted money. Well made game but little depth or complexity. Got bored in a few minutes.
reviews.author: Paul Rail
